title: Riot? Did you take my idea???
body: A while back i wrote a discussion surrounding my "underwater Vel'koz" idea, i explained How i would like it to look and the new Ironside Malphite skin... Which i LOVE! fits the exact drawing i drew but never psoted cause looked that bad XD But i just wanted to know if it gave you inspiration cause thst would be really cool :D{{champion:54}}

replies.body:
Sadly, this isn't NA. So if you have a champion or skin idea you want them to notice, it has to be god damn amazing, have full concept drawings and be basically ready for production straight off the boards. In other words, don't expect too much.

If they ever do use your idea though, chances are they wont tell you anyway until it's released. This happened with Bard, Rek'Sai and a few others.
Oh. Hahaha well then, it just resembled my idea haha Guess it was just a coincidence
